mapper.select: SELECT A.id, A.adspot_name, A.adspot_type, C.name AS adspot_type_name, B.platform_type, A.media_id, B.media_name, B.bundle_ids, A.status, A.timeout, A.device_daily_req_limit, A.device_daily_imp_limit, A.device_req_interval, IF(TRIM(COALESCE(A.special_settings, '')) = '', '{}', A.special_settings) AS special_settings FROM adspot A LEFT OUTER JOIN media B ON A.media_id = B.id LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT value, name FROM system_code WHERE code_type_id = 2 AND status = 1 ) C ON A.adspot_type = C.value WHERE A.id = #{adspotId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adspot (adspot_name, adspot_type, media_id, timeout, status, mark_delete, device_daily_req_limit, device_daily_imp_limit, device_req_interval, special_settings) VALUES (#{adspotName}, #{adspotType}, #{mediaId}, #{timeout}, 1, 0, #{deviceDailyReqLimit}, #{deviceDailyImpLimit}, #{deviceReqInterval}, #{property, typeHandler=com.easyads.component.mybatis.JsonTypeHandler})
mapper.update:
UPDATE adspot SET adspot_name = #{adspot.adspotName}, timeout = #{adspot.timeout}, device_daily_req_limit = #{adspot.deviceDailyReqLimit}, device_daily_imp_limit = #{adspot.deviceDailyImpLimit}, device_req_interval = #{adspot.deviceReqInterval}, special_settings = #{adspot.property, typeHandler=com.easyads.component.mybatis.JsonTypeHandler},
status = #{adspot.status}, closed_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
status = #{adspot.status}, closed_at = NULL
WHERE id = #{adspotId}
UPDATE adspot SET mark_delete = 1, status = 0 WHERE id = #{adspotId}
